text: On April 20, 2023, Larry Elder, an American right-wing political commentator and conservative talk radio host who ran for Governor of California in 2021, announced his campaign for president of the United States. A few months after the recall election in California, Elder began thinking about the idea of running for president. On October 26, 2023, Elder ended his campaign and endorsed former President Donald Trump's re-election bid. ==References== Elder, Larry
title: Larry Elder 2024 presidential campaign
